r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Fixed Bug that when call to Yaf_Config_Ini/Yaf_Config_Simple with freaky paramters then invoke its methods cause crash (thanks to Felipe Pena) - Yaf_Application::execute call Zend_API call_user_func instead of call zif_call_user_func, since zif_call_user_func was not declared with dllexport - Built on windows with PHP-5.3.6 and PHP-5.2.15 (you can download the dll on Yaf Google Code) - Corrected some broken C89 statements
